title: News24.com | WATCH | Capetonians give coronavirus frontline workers a heartfelt thank
description: Capetonians have given frontline workers a heartfelt thank you amid the national lockdown to fight Covid-19.
content:
Capetonians gave frontline workers a heartfelt thank you at 20:00 on Friday amid the national lockdown to fight Covid-19. 
On the first day of the lockdown, residents in the City Bowl applauded them for their part to battle the virus.
They applauded and che… [+473 chars]
